SELECT B.berthidx, B.idx, B.berthname, B.berthsize, B.berthmax, B.berthprice, B.berthtv, B.berthdry, B.berthrefri, B.berthinternet, CASE WHEN RD.reservisit IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS reserState FROM berth B LEFT JOIN reservisit RD ON B.berthidx = RD.berthidx AND RD.reservisit BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') where B.idx = #{idx} group by B.berthidx, B.idx, B.berthname, B.berthsize, B.berthmax, B.berthprice, B.berthtv, B.berthdry, B.berthrefri, B.berthinternet, CASE WHEN RD.reservisit IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
